format: JavaScript (with React and Jest testing framework)
description: Test file for the GraphCanvas component, verifying autoresize behavior of container nodes when child nodes extend beyond bounds.

methods.name: describe
methods.description: Defines a test suite for GraphCanvas autoresize containers.

methods.name: test
methods.description: Defines a test case that verifies container resizing behavior when a child node is added beyond bounds.

methods.name: setNodes
methods.description: Updates the nodes in the graph store with specified nodes for testing.
